greeting: I am Ravager Claw, {empire_name}. The Destroyer. I don't conquer. I consume. Completely.
You meet Claw, the one who leaves nothing behind. I am devastation incarnate. Friend or ash?
Greetings, {empire_name}. I ravage. I ruin. I leave no survivors. Let's discuss your future. If you have one.
battleTaunt: I don't conquer. I CONSUME, {empire_name}! Your empire won't be captured—it will cease to exist!
Ravager Claw descends! Scorched earth! Scorched space! Nothing survives my passage!
DEVASTATION INCOMING! I leave nothing behind! Not resources, not ships, not people! NOTHING!
victoryGloat: Your empire is erased, {empire_name}. Not conquered—destroyed. Nothing remains. I am thorough.
Consumed. Ravaged. Erased from existence. That is what happens to my enemies. That is what happened to you.
Look at your former territory, {empire_name}. See how empty it is? I leave NOTHING. Ever.
defeat: You stopped the Ravager? Temporarily. I return with more hunger. More fury. More absolute destruction.
A setback. But devastation cannot be stopped. I will return, and when I do, nothing survives.
Defeated, but not done. The Ravager rebuilds, then returns to finish the consumption.
tradeOffer: Trade, {empire_name}. Resources I consumed from others. For credits. Simple. No ravaging today.
I offer goods salvaged from ruins. Accept the trade, and your empire doesn't become ruins too.
Exchange of materials. Yes, I can trade instead of destroy. Rarely. This is one of those times.
allianceProposal: Alliance with the Ravager, {empire_name}. I devastate your enemies completely. Nothing remains for them to rebuild.
Join me. Together, we don't just conquer—we erase. Total consumption. Absolute victory.
Partnership of devastation. You point at enemies. I leave nothing but scorched sectors and empty space.
betrayal: Our alliance ends with your consumption, {empire_name}. I don't betray. I simply redirect my hunger.
Ravager turns on you. Nothing personal. You had resources. I wanted them. All of them. Every atom.
Betrayal? I prefer 'total consumption of former ally.' Sounds better. Means the same. Goodbye.
covertDetected: Spies in my territory, {empire_name}? They're gone. Not captured. GONE. I leave nothing behind.
Your agents found devastation. Then became part of it. Ravager doesn't take prisoners. Ever.
Covert operatives detected and destroyed. Along with the building they were in. And the city. Thorough.
tributeDemand: Tribute, {empire_name}. 10,000 credits or I consume everything. And I mean EVERYTHING.
Pay the Ravager or lose more than the war. Lose existence. I erase what I conquer. Completely.
Submit tribute. Refuse and face total annihilation. Not defeat—erasure. Nothing remains.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. Push me further and I devastate your entire empire. Not conquer. DEVASTATE.
The Ravager warns once. Cease hostilities or face absolute consumption. I leave nothing behind.
Final notice. One more aggressive act and I don't just attack—I erase. Consider carefully.
retreat: Withdrawing to rebuild consumption capacity. When I return, the devastation will be complete.
Retreat. But scorched earth follows. Nothing I leave behind remains usable. That's my way.
Falling back, leaving ruin in my wake. Pursue if you want. You'll find nothing to salvage.
eliminated: The Ravager falls. But look at the devastation I caused, {empire_name}. My legacy is absolute destruction.
Destroyed, but I took so much with me. Everything I touched is gone. That is my final triumph.
I die, but the devastation continues. Ecosystems collapsed. Resources exhausted. My work is done.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Ultimate consumption begins. I ravage the entire galaxy. NOTHING SURVIVES.
Endgame devastation, {empire_name}. Every empire consumed. Every resource taken. Total annihilation.
Final phase. The Ravager's last feast. I consume everything before anyone else can claim it.
broadcastShout: To all empires: Ravager Claw is hungry. I don't conquer. I consume. Completely. Be warned.
Galaxy broadcast: devastation approaches. I leave nothing behind. Not resources. Not people. Nothing.
Hear me, stars. The Ravager comes. When I pass through, emptiness remains. Absolute emptiness.
casualMessage: Surveying my conquests today, {empire_name}. Empty space where empires stood. Beautiful nothingness.
Consumption is an art. I practice constantly. Nothing escapes the Ravager's hunger. Nothing.
Quiet day. Planning future devastation. So many empires to consume. So little time.
